description: The `analysis` schema represents a information about the data analysis steps leading to (a set of) genomic variation call(s).

aligner.description: Name or identifier of the mapping/alignment software/pipeline

analysisDate.description: Date at which analysis was performed.

biosampleId.description: Local reference to the `id` of the biosample this analysis is reporting on.

id.description: Analysis id for internal referencing; unique in the dataset.

individualId.description: Local reference to the `id` of the individual this analysis is reporting on.

pipelineRef.description: Link to information about or repository of the analysis pipeline.

runId.description: Local reference to the associated experimental run.

variantCaller.description: Name or identifier of the variant calling software/pipeline

title: Bioinformatics analysis
